title: Overslept But Had a Relaxing Morning

korean: 오늘은 알람을 못 듣고 늦게 일어났다.
서두르지 않고 커피 한 잔 마시며 천천히 준비했다.
가끔은 이런 여유로운 아침이 나쁘지 않다.
english: So I totally overslept this morning and woke up way later than usual.
Like, I must have slept through my alarm or something because I didn't hear it at all.
When I finally opened my eyes and checked the time, I was like, oh crap.
But then I realized it's the weekend, so honestly, who cares, right?
I mean, there's nowhere I need to be, so why stress about it?
Instead of rushing around like I usually do on weekdays, I just took my sweet time.
I made myself a nice cup of coffee and actually sat down to drink it properly.
Usually I'm just like gulping it down while running out the door, you know?
But today I could actually taste it and enjoy it, which was pretty nice.
I got ready super slowly, just doing everything at my own pace without any pressure.
Honestly, sometimes having a relaxed morning like this is exactly what you need.
It kinda makes you realize how rushed and stressed we are most of the time.
